events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and look forward to reviewing your qualifications carefully.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, specifically for the software development role you applied for.
A recruiter has been assigned to handle your application and will contact you soon regarding the next steps in the recruitment process.
Your initial screening interview has been completed successfully, and the feedback from the interviewer was very encouraging.
You have promptly responded to our scheduling request, confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 6th at 10 AM UTC; please be prepared to discuss your software development experience.
You have successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong knowledge in coding and system design principles.
Your HR interview is scheduled for May 8th at 3 PM UTC, where you will discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well, and your values align closely with our company culture and team ethos.
We have sent you a formal offer for the Software Engineer position including a competitive salary and benefits package.
You provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed excitement about the possibility of joining our engineering team.
You have formally accepted the job offer, and we are excited to welcome you to our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started with all necessary documentation submitted and initial training sessions scheduled.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with you fully onboarded and integrated into the software engineering team.
